name: RRB NTPC Exam Mock test & Practice Set Railway Exa
description: Railway RRB NTPC Exam 2019  Railway Recruitment Board has announced 35277 posts in Non Technical. The complete preparation package for Railway NTPC in Hindi is provided in this app with previous papers of Railway NTPC exam.  RRB NTPC Exam 2019 Gk Tayaari in hindi  RRB NTPC Exam Preparation App in Hindi  This app can easily make the preparation of the Railway RRB NTPC as it is available in this app to give you daily information about.  RRB NTPC Exam Pattern  Mode of examination: CBT : Computer Based Test (multiple choice questions) Duration: 90 minutes Number of Questions: 100 Total points: 100 Negative Marking: For every wrong answer, 1/3 points will be deducted.  Parts of RRB NTPC Examination General Awareness, Arithmetic, general intelligence and reasoning section, General Science  RRB NTPC Examination Syllabus - RRB NTPC exams are specifically asked questions related to India and neighboring countries such as history, culture, geography, economic scenario, general policy and related to scientific research, etc. While preparing for the General Awareness section, you must read the following topics- Current Affairs Questions, Indian History Questions, General Science, National and international current affairs, Indian culture and heritage, The Constitution of India, Geography of India and all India Gk Questions.
